content: ** a mistake was found in row 8 it has been corrected please download the new copy ** so we ve all heard about a certain virus sigh so i did a little self-isolating out of pure fear and solitude was the result solitude is a triangle shaped shawl with center v-st increases one skein of mandala wool blend was enough to make this and i still had a bit of yarn left over it s not a huge shawl - it ll comfortably fit around the neck and shoulders basic crochet experience is recommended i don t really go into all the stitches i used like double_crochet single_crochet etc figuring most of you already know the basics a photo tutorial/progress section is included so you can see where to place certain stitches etc the pattern is quite easy once you get into the flow of it gauge is not essential for this design enjoy stay healthy and wash those hands lol
